py_sim package¶

py_sim pakcage overview¶

Author¶

  • kyunghan <kyunghah.min@gmail.com>

Description¶

  • Simulation package of electric vehicle in python environment

Sub models¶

  • Vehicle model
  • Maneuver model
  • Environment model

Update¶

  • [18/05/31] - Initial release - kyunghan

Notice¶

  • Make some applications at applications folder
  • Good job guys!! ~_~
